RhythmCommand¶

class baca.tools.RhythmCommand.RhythmCommand(division_maker=None, division_expression=None, left_broken=None, multimeasure_rests=None, persist=None, reference_meters=None, rewrite_meter=None, rewrite_rest_filled=None, rhythm_maker=None, rhythm_overwrites=None, right_broken=None, split_at_measure_boundaries=None, stages=None, tie_first=None, tie_last=None)¶

Rhythm command.

>>> from abjad import rhythmmakertools as rhythmos

>>> command = baca.RhythmCommand(
...     rhythm_maker=rhythmos.NoteRhythmMaker(),
...     )

>>> command = baca.RhythmCommand(
...     division_expression=abjad.sequence().sum().sequence(),
...     rhythm_maker=rhythmos.NoteRhythmMaker(),
...     )

>>> rhythm_maker_1 = rhythmos.NoteRhythmMaker()
>>> rhythm_maker_2 = rhythmos.EvenRunRhythmMaker()
>>> command = baca.RhythmCommand(
...     rhythm_maker=[
...         (rhythm_maker_1, abjad.index([0], 2)),
...         (rhythm_maker_2, abjad.index([1], 2)),
...         ],
...     )

>>> maker = baca.SegmentMaker(
...     score_template=baca.SingleStaffScoreTemplate(),
...     spacing=baca.minimum_duration((1, 12)),
...     time_signatures=[(3, 8), (3, 8), (3, 8), (3, 8), (3, 8)],
...     )

>>> maker(
...     'MusicVoice',
...     command,
...     )

>>> lilypond_file = maker.run(environment='docs')
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Special methods

__call__(start_offset=None, time_signatures=None)¶

Calls command on start_offset and time_signatures.

Return type:AnnotatedTimespan
(AbjadObject).__format__(format_specification='')¶

Formats Abjad object.

Set format_specification to ‘’ or ‘storage’. Interprets ‘’ equal to ‘storage’.

Returns string.

(AbjadObject).__repr__()¶

Gets interpreter representation of Abjad object.

Returns string.

Return type:Optional[bool]

Read-only properties

(Command).deactivate¶

Is true when command deactivates tag.

Return type:Optional[bool]

Gets division expression.

Return type:Optional[Expression]
division_maker¶

Gets division-maker.

Return type:Union[DivisionMaker, FlattenDivisionCallback, FuseByCountsDivisionCallback, PartitionDivisionCallback, SplitByDurationsDivisionCallback, SplitByRoundedRatiosDivisionCallback, None]
left_broken¶

Is true when rhythm is left-broken.

Return type:Optional[bool]
multimeasure_rests¶

Is true when command spells each rest-filled division as a single multimeasure rest.

Return type:Optional[bool]
parameter¶

Gets persistence parameter.

>>> baca.RhythmCommand().parameter
'RHYTHM'
Return type:str
persist¶

Gets persist name.

Return type:Optional[str]

Gets reference meters.

Only used to rewrite meters.

Return type:Optional[Iterable[Meter]]

Return type:Optional[bool]

Is true when command rewrites meter.

Return type:Optional[bool]

Is true when command rewrites rest-filled divisions.

Return type:Optional[bool]
rhythm_maker¶

Gets rhythm-maker or selection.

Return type:Union[RhythmMaker, Selection, Iterable[Tuple[Union[RhythmMaker, Selection], Pattern]], None]

Gets rhythm overwrites.

Return type:Optional[List[tuple]]

Is true when rhythm is right-broken.

Return type:Optional[bool]

Populated by segment-maker.
